extracted_information: Comprehensive information regarding the game Assassin's Creed Mirage is extracted, including its title, developer, publisher, a detailed description, specific release dates for iOS platforms, and various official media URLs. Details on game features, characters, and the Deluxe Edition are also provided.
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: Assassin's Creed Mirage is a narrative-driven action-adventure experience where players assume the role of Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions seeking answers and justice. He joins an ancient organization, transforming into a refined Master Assassin. The game offers a highly versatile Assassin experience with seamless parkour, the largest assortment of tools in the franchise, and visceral assassinations. Players explore a dense, vibrant, and reactive city (Baghdad during its Golden Age) with four unique districts, uncovering secrets, engaging in world events, and interacting with historical figures. It serves as a modern take on the features and gameplay that defined the franchise for 15 years, including a journey to Alamut, the legendary home of the Assassins, as a heartfelt homage to the series' origins.

pricing.access_requirements_for_digital_content: Requires owning an eligible edition, launching the game at least once, and logging into the platform with the same Ubisoft account used for playing Assassin's Creed Mirage.

Set during the Golden Age of Baghdad.
Modern take on classic franchise features and gameplay.
Journey to Alamut, the legendary home of the Assassins.
Heartfelt homage to the game that started it all.

list.name: Basim
list.description: Born in Samarra, grew up in Baghdad. Aspires to join the Hidden Ones.

list.name: Roshan
list.description: Master assassin from Alamut. Takes Basim as her first apprentice.

list.name: Nehal
list.description: Loner, stubborn, and determined. Advises Basim to trust only himself.

list.name: Ali
list.description: Clever and erudite, fights against the caliphate. Collaborates with Hidden Ones but values freedom above their credo.
